item.description:
Jason Segel and Emily Blunt in a comedy produced by Judd Apatow. That's enough for me!

I will purchase my ticket at about 5:15 p.m., then wait in the theater lobby, across from the concession stand, for about 20 minutes. Look for me and my red backpack. At 5:35, I will move into the theater auditorium (can't miss the previews). You can find me in the theater auditorium if you are late. The movie starts at 5:50 p.m.

After the movie, I will wait in the theater lobby to gather everyone. Look for the red backpack.

If we decide to go out after the movie (we'll decide after the movie), be prepared to add 25% to the cost of your order for both the tax and the tip. Bring cash to make division of the check easier.

Please RSVP if you plan to attend this event so I know who to look for.

Marianne
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the red backpack. See the event description for more details.
item.name: The Five-Year Engagement
